name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Skilled Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing and optimizing backend systems, particularly in financial applications and AI/ML integration. Proficient in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **SQL**, **VBA**, **AWS**, **Azure**, **Airflow**, **dbt**, and **Spark**. Capable of implementing CI/CD practices and version control using **GitHub**, ensuring robust integration and delivery processes. Strong problem-solving skills complemented by excellent communication abilities. Demonstrated success in delivering high-performance APIs and scalable services at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
• Engineered backend services in **Python** using **FastAPI** to streamline document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows, enhancing processing speed by **30%**.
• Developed event-driven solutions with **Celery** and **Redis** to effectively manage asynchronous processing for financial transaction requests, improving throughput by **25%**.
• Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and utilized **Terraform** to manage infrastructure as code, ensuring seamless cloud operations with **99.9%** uptime.
• Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring timely and accurate data flow, achieving compliance deadlines with a **100%** success rate.
• Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure, scalable authentication systems, enhancing security protocols and user data protection.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensure compliance, and oversee release strategies, leveraging strong communication and problem-solving skills.

Key responsibilities include:
- Developed backend systems using **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, enhancing user onboarding efficiency by **30%**.
- Created event-driven microservices with **Celery** and **Redis** for asynchronous processing of financial data, improving transaction request handling time by **40%**.
- Managed deployment processes on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to maintain consistent and scalable environments, reducing deployment time by **50%**.
- Engineered secure data pipelines for regulatory data exchange, utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to streamline data flow, resulting in a **25%** increase in data processing speed.
- Conducted security audits for compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication and secure access management.
- Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to enhance system integration, ensuring regulatory compliance and successful release management.

Utilized **Python** and **SQL** to develop robust backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, enhancing trading operations by **30%**.
Implemented **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services for scalable application deployment, achieving a decrease in latency by **25%**.
Engineered real-time price feed processors using **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, delivering up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions with a responsiveness of under **100ms**.
Collaborated closely with frontend teams to provide data through REST APIs and WebSocket channels, ensuring smooth user interaction with the platform while improving data retrieval times by **15%**.
Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including MiFID II and GDPR, while adhering to internal data security protocols and improving audit scores by **20%**.
Implemented comprehensive test suites utilizing **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers to streamline QA and CI/CD processes, reducing development cycle time by **40%**.

Leveraged **GitHub** for version control and collaboration, facilitating effective team communication and project tracking.
